targets.rawSql: SELECT "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_pressure FROM sensor_readings
SELECT uva AS "UVA", uvb AS "UVB", uvc AS "UVC", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_temperature AS "BMP", uv_temp AS "UV", dallas_extern AS "EXTERN", dallas_intern AS "INTERN" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_pressure, "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT system_cpu_usage_percent AS "CPU (%)", system_ram_usage_percent AS "RAM (%)", system_temp_cpu_thermal AS "CPU (ºC)" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT uva AS "UVA", uvb AS "UVB", uvc AS "UVC", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_temperature AS "BMP", uv_temp AS "UV", dallas_intern AS "INTERN", dallas_extern AS "EXTERN", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT gps_distance AS "Distance" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT gps_satellites AS "SATELLITES" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT gps_hdop AS "HDOP", gps_vdop AS "VDOP", gps_pdop AS "PDOP", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_altitude AS "BMP", gps_altitude AS "GPS", "timestamp", gps_height_geoid AS "GEOID" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT gps_gga_latitude AS "LATITUDE", gps_gga_longitude AS "LONGITUDE" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT uva AS "UV", bmp_pressure AS "BMP", acelx AS "IMU", dallas_intern AS "DS18B20", gps_gga_latitude AS "GPS", system_temp_cpu_thermal AS "SYSTEM" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT gps_speed_mps AS "Horizontal", bmp_vertical_speed AS "Vertical", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_altitude AS "BMP", gps_altitude AS "GPS" FROM sensor_readings

SELECT
    bmp_pressure AS PRESSURE, 
    bmp_temperature AS BMP_TEMP, 
    bmp_altitude AS BMP_ALT, 
    bmp_vertical_speed AS VERTICAL_SPEED,
    dallas_intern AS "INTERN", 
    dallas_extern AS "EXTERN",
    gps_speed_mps AS SPEED_MPS, 
    gps_gga_latitude AS LATITUDE, 
    gps_gga_longitude AS LONGITUDE, 
    gps_altitude AS GPS_ALTITUDE, 
    gps_height_geoid AS HEIGHT_GEOID, 
    gps_satellites AS SATELLITES,
    timestamp
FROM sensor_readings;

SELECT 
    gps_gga_latitude AS LATITUDEGGA, 
    gps_gga_longitude AS LONGITUDEGGA, 
    gps_distance AS DISTANCE,
    gps_altitude AS ALTITUDE, 
    gps_satellites AS SATELLITES,
    gps_pdop AS PDOP,
    gps_hdop AS HDOP,
    gps_vdop AS VDOP,

    timestamp

FROM sensor_readings;

SELECT 
acelx AS "ACELX", 
acely AS "ACELY", 
acelz AS "ACELZ", 
girox AS "GYROX", 
giroy AS "GYROY", 
giroz AS "GYROZ", 
magx AS "MAGX", 
magy AS "MAGY", 
magz AS "MAGZ", 
"timestamp" AS "TIME" 
FROM sensor_readings
SELECT gps_gga_latitude AS "LATITUDE", gps_gga_longitude AS "LONGITUDE" FROM sensor_readings
